about_the_game:
Get ready to experience a world that's richer, more distinct, and more dangerous than ever before with the first expansion of the Erannorth Chronicles - "Ancient Ruins". This epic expansion seamlessly expands the world with new challenges, deadly bosses, and new loot that are perfect for mid to high-level characters.

With over 400 new cards, you can discover and recruit over 200 new allies, new legendary equipment, and other expertise-neutral cards that everyone can use and complement or enhance your build. Face over 100 new enemies, including 40 unique bosses that utilize different cards and tactics, and 60 regular enemies that make higher-level campaigns deadlier and more challenging.

Discover 65 new quest chains, each with exclusive rewards that you can't get anywhere else in the world. From exploring ancient ruins to battling fearsome foes, "Ancient Ruins" has everything you need to take your gameplay to the next level.

Do you have what it takes to survive the challenges of the Ancient Ruins? Get ready to embark on an unforgettable adventure and test your skills to the limit with this amazing expansion.
detailed_description:
Disclaimer

DLCs for Erannorth progressively increase the game's complexity and difficulty and aren't recommended to own before you are familiar with the base game. If you try to decide which to get between the available DLCs, I would advise getting them in release order for a smoother transition in Difficulty and Complexity.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 x64bit
  • Processor: Dual Core CPU or better
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card with DX10 (shader model 4.0) capabilities.
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 6 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Only 16/9 resolutions are supported in full screen.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 x64bit
  • Processor: Quad Core CPU or better
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card with DX12 (shader model 4.0) capabilities.
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 8 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Only 16/9 resolutions are supported in full screen.
